惣菜: (そうざい) - side dish; daily (household) dish
惣領: (そうりょう) - eldest child/oldest child/first-born child; child who carries on the family name; pre-ritsuryo official established in key provinces, responsible for administration of his home and surrounding provinces; head of a warrior clan (Kamakura period)
惣領制: (そうりょうせい) - soryo system; organization of regional landholding families based on divided inheritance under the leadership of a main heir, usu. the eldest son (Kamakura period)
惧れる: (おそれる) - to fear; to be afraid of
惨たらしい: (むごたらしい) - incredibly brutal; gory; gruesome
惨たる光景: (さんたるこうけい) - disastrous scene
惨め: (みじめ) - miserable; wretched; unhappy; sad; pitiable
惨事: (sanji) - desastre, tragédia, incidente trágico, acidente horrível
惨害: (さんがい) - heavy damage; havoc; ravages
惨憺: (さんたん) - miserable; pitiful; tragic; wretched; horrible
惨敗: (ざんぱい) - ignominious defeat; crushing failure; utterly beaten; overwhelming defeat
惨死体: (ざんしたい) - corpse of a person who has met a violent death
惨況: (さんきょう) - wretched state; pitiable condition
惨澹: (さんたん) - miserable; pitiful; tragic; wretched; horrible
惨状を極める: (さんじょうをきわめる) - to present a very terrible (miserable) sight
惨苦: (さんく) - terrible pain; terrible hardship; terrible suffering
惨落: (さんらく) - slump; sudden fall of market price
惰力: (だりょく) - inertia/momentum; force of habit
想い: (おもい) - thought; imagination/mind/heart; desire/wish/hope/expectation; (e.g. Ａ思いのＢ for 'B who loves A') love/affection; feelings/emotion/sentiment/experience
想いこがれる: (おもいこがれる) - to pine for
想いをよせる: (おもいをよせる) - to give one's heart to; to fall in love
想いを寄せる: (おもいをよせる) - to give one's heart to; to fall in love
想い人: (おもいびと) - loved one; lover; sweetheart
想い入れ: (おもいいれ) - emotional attachment; attitude (expressing emotion)/meditative pose (e.g. an actor)/posing for effect
想い到る: (おもいいたる) - to realize; to realise; to hit upon something
想い焦がれる: (おもいこがれる) - to pine for
想い焦れる: (おもいこがれる) - to pine for
想う: (おもう) - (想う has connotations of heart-felt) to think/to consider/to believe; to think (of doing)/to plan (to do); to judge/to assess/to regard; to imagine/to suppose/to dream; to expect/to look forward to; to feel/to desire/to want; to recall/to remember
想を練る: (そうをねる) - to turn (a matter) over in one's mind; to think deeply
想像がつく: (そうぞうがつく) - one can imagine
想像が付く: (そうぞうがつく) - one can imagine
想像し難い: (そうぞうしにくい) - hard to imagine
想像に任せる: (そうぞうにまかせる) - to leave something to someone's imagination (e.g. I'll leave that to your imagination)
想像に難くない: (そうぞうにかたくない) - easy to imagine
想像を絶する: (そうぞうをぜっする) - beyond imagination; unimaginable
想像妊娠: (そうぞうにんしん) - false pregnancy; pseudocyesis
想入れ: (おもいいれ) - emotional attachment; attitude (expressing emotion)/meditative pose (e.g. an actor)/posing for effect
想到: (そうとう) - thinking of; hitting upon
想定外: (そうていがい) - beyond expectations; beyond what one expected; not foreseen; exceeding assumptions
想定小数点: (そうていしょうすうてん) - assumed decimal point
想察: (そうさつ) - surmisal; hypothesis; speculation; conjecture; supposition
想起: (そうき) - remembering/recollection/recall/retrieval; to remember/to recall/to recollect/to call to mind/to envision
惶遽: (こうきょ) - being afraid and panicked
惸独: (けいどく) - orphan; last of kin
惹かれる: (ひかれる) - to be charmed by; to be attracted to; to be taken with; to be drawn to
惹きつける: (ひきつける) - to fascinate/to attract/to charm/to pull up (at a gate); (引き付ける, 引付ける, 引きつける, 引付る only) to have a convulsion
惹き付ける: (ひきつける) - to fascinate/to attract/to charm/to pull up (at a gate); (引き付ける, 引付ける, 引きつける, 引付る only) to have a convulsion
惹起: (じゃっき) - bringing about; cause; provocation
惻隠の情: (そくいんのじょう) - compassion; pity
愁い顔: (うれいがお) - sad face; sorrowful face; anxious look; sad countenance
愁う: (うりょう) - (v2h-k)    to worry/to be concerned; (v2h-s)    to grieve/to lament/to be anxious/to be distressed
愁うべき: (うれうべき) - deplorable; alarming; grievous; lamentable
愁え: (うれえ) - lamentation; grief/anguish; anxiety; illness; mourning
愁える: (うれえる) - to grieve; to lament; to be anxious; to be distressed
愁ふ: (うりょう) - (v2h-k)    to worry/to be concerned; (v2h-s)    to grieve/to lament/to be anxious/to be distressed
愁眉: (しゅうび) - worried look; melancholy air
愁眉を開く: (しゅうびをひらく) - to feel relieved
愈: (ゆ) - Be Superior , more and more, all the more, increasingly; at last, finally, beyond doubt; (no) last moment, worst possible time
愈々: (いよいよ) - more and more/all the more/increasingly; at last/finally/beyond doubt; (at the) last moment/worst possible time
